hero.title: Amasia Bilingual and Technical School Complex
hero.subtitle: Since 1994, Amasia has distinguished itself as a bilingual and technical school complex dedicated to training responsible and competent elites. We offer a complete path combining academic rigor and practical skills.

about.title: Who Are We?
about.content: Amasia Bilingual and Technical School Complex is a complete educational establishment - nursery, primary, general secondary, and technical - recognized for the quality of its training. Founded in 1994 by Item Diallo Maïmouna Marie, Amasia has established itself as one of the most respected bilingual institutions in Cameroon.
about.content2: Our pedagogical approach harmoniously combines Francophone and Anglophone academic standards with innovative technical training. We guarantee solid preparation for official exams and the challenges of the professional world.
about.content3: Over the years, Amasia has trained thousands of learners who are now pursuing brilliant careers in Cameroon and internationally.

mma_highlight.title: MMA & Education Program
mma_highlight.text: The Amasia Bilingual School Complex offers a high-quality MMA program for young people. MMA is a tool for education and development that teaches essential values such as discipline and respect. Young people develop their physical condition, coordination, and agility thanks to MMA. The program also helps to develop the mind and manage stress and pressure.
mma_highlight.text2: Amasia athletes have achieved exceptional results at the national and international levels. The MMA program is unique and combines high-quality training with education and academic support. The goal is to help young people succeed in all areas of their life. MMA is a powerful tool to help young people achieve their goals and realize their dreams. The Amasia Bilingual School Complex invites young people passionate about MMA to join its program. Together, they can achieve great goals and make a difference in the lives of young people.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.missionContent: To prepare every student to excel in a fast-changing world. We offer quality teaching and innovative technical training that develop solid, practical, and current skills.
mission.visionContent: In a bilingual, secure, and stimulating environment, we help every young person reveal their potential, gain confidence, and become an engaged actor of tomorrow. We train tomorrow's talents: confident, bilingual, and competent.

programs.title: Our Educational Programs
programs.subtitle: From nursery to high school diploma - a complete, bilingual, and structured path

kindergarten.title: Nursery Education
kindergarten.desc: A stimulating preschool program that develops the child's natural curiosity. We favor playful methods promoting linguistic (French/English), social, psychomotor, and cognitive awakening.
features: Bilingual learning from an early age

primary.title: Primary Education
primary.desc: A complete bilingual curriculum that strengthens fundamental bases: reading, writing, mathematics, sciences, and digital skills.

secondary.title: General Secondary Education
secondary.desc: Solid training from the first to the second cycle. We offer series A, C, D, TIC as well as the Anglophone system with GCE Ordinary & Advanced Level.
features: All scientific (C, D) and literary (A) series
Preparation for BEPC, Probatoire, Baccalauréat, GCE

technical.title: Technical Education
technical.desc: Quality professional and technical training leading to CAP, Technical Probatoire, Technical Baccalauréat, ITVE, and ATVE diplomas.
